q40.question: The point P moves in a plane such that it is always at equal distance from two fixed points, A and B in the same plane. Which of these is the locus of the point P? The bisector of angle PAB A circle centre B and radius AB A circle with AB as the diameter The perpendicular bisector of line AB.
